completeListOfAbilities.name: BRV Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Magic attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: HP Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Expends BRV to deal HP damage

completeListOfAbilities.name: Beckoning Blast & Flare Combo
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
Target: 1 turn Beckoning Blast debuff
Self: 3 turns Thirst for Dominion
When attacking target afflicted with Beckoning Blast debuff:
 • Does not reinflict Beckoning Blast debuff
 • Triggers additional trap attack Beckoning Blast (4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt; target: 4 turns SPD Down I; no Knock Back) before attack

Upon expiration of Beckoning Blast debuff:
 • Triggers trap attack Beckoning Blast

ailments.name: Thirst for Dominion
ailments.desc: Thirst for Dominion: Raises own MAX BRV、 ATK; lowers all enemies' SPD (does not stack)

ailments.name: Beckoning Blast
ailments.desc: Beckoning Blast: Lowers DEF; triggers trap attack Beckoning Blast upon expiration

ailments.name: Thirst for Dominion
ailments.desc: Thirst for Dominion: Raises own MAX BRV、 ATK; lowers all enemies' SPD (does not stack)

completeListOfAbilities.name: Thunder Crest & Stygian Swell
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Target: 2 turns Thunder Crest debuff
When attacking target afflicted with Thunder Crest debuff:
 • Does not reinflict Thunder Crest debuff
 • Triggers additional trap attack Thunder Crest (4-hit group magic BRV attack + single-target HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt to target; no Knock Back) before attack

Upon expiration of Thunder Crest debuff:
 • Triggers trap attack Thunder Crest

ailments.name: Thunder Crest
ailments.desc: Thunder Crest: Lowers DEF; triggers trap attack Thunder Crest upon expiration

completeListOfAbilities.name: Dreary Cell & Starfall
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Triggers respective trap attack when target afflicted with Thunder Crest、 Beckoning Blast、 Dreary Cell debuffs
4-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Target: Overwrites with 1 turn Thunder Crest、 Beckoning Blast、 Dreary Cell debuffs

Trap attack Dreary Cell:
 • 2-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack that ignores DEF
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt
 • Delays target 1 turn
 • No Knock Back

passives.name: Beckoning Blast & Flare Combo Extension
passives.desc:
When using Beckoning Blast & Flare Combo:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When trap attack Beckoning Blast triggers:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost

While Thirst for Dominion active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (magic BRV attack + HP attack)
passives.short_desc: Beckoning Blast & Flare Combo Extension: Boost to Beckoning Blast & Flare Combo

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK、 SPD with active buff
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATK、 SPD

passives.name: Thunder Crest & Stygian Swell Extension
passives.desc:
When using Thunder Crest & Stygian Swell:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When trap attack Thunder Crest triggers:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
passives.short_desc: Thunder Crest & Stygian Swell Extension: Boost to Thunder Crest & Stygian Swell

passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passive.short_desc: Debuff Attack Up Growth: Boost to Debuff Attack Up

passive.name: Debuff Success Attack Longer

passive.short_desc: Debuff Success Attack Longer: Raises ATK

 • BRV damage boost
 • Thirst for Dominion boost、 duration+
*Trap attacks excluded
passive.short_desc: One Move toward Conquest: Boost to Beckoning Blast & Flare Combo

 • BRV damage boost
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
*Trap attacks excluded

passive.desc: May equip EX ability Dreary Cell & Starfall

passives.name: Dreary Cell & Starfall Buff Plus
passives.desc: When using Dreary Cell & Starfall:\n • Self: 6 turns Hell Power
passives.short_desc: Dreary Cell & Starfall Buff Plus: Grants Hell Power when using Dreary Cell & Starfall

passives.name: Dreary Cell & Starfall Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Dreary Cell & Starfall
passives.short_desc: Dreary Cell & Starfall Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Dreary Cell & Starfall

passive.name: Ultimate Dominion Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Dreary Cell & Starfall
passive.short_desc: Ultimate Dominion Extension: Boost to Dreary Cell & Starfall

passives.name: Starfall Force Advance
passives.desc:
When using Dreary Cell & Starfall:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
*Trap attacks excluded
passives.short_desc: Starfall Force Advance: Boost to Dreary Cell & Starfall

passives.name: Dreary Cell & Starfall Buff Plus Starting Trap All
passives.desc:
When using Dreary Cell & Starfall:
 • Thunder Crest、 Beckoning Blast、 Dreary Cell debuff infliction extended to all enemies
 • Self: 6 turns Thirst for Dominion

6 turns Thirst for Dominion、 Hell Power at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Dreary Cell & Starfall Buff Plus Starting Trap All: Boost to Dreary Cell & Starfall

passives.name: Ultimate Dominion Extension Attack Boost Up++
passives.desc:
While equipping EX+ weapon Venom Rod (II)+ or passive ability Ultimate Dominion Extension:
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK

While Thirst for Dominion active:
 • BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+)
 • HP Attack、 HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Ultimate Dominion Extension Attack Boost Up++: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK; enables BRV Attack++、 HP Attack++ while Thirst for Dominion active

passives.name: Dreary Cell & Starfall BRV Hit Plus Force Advance
passives.desc:
When using Dreary Cell & Starfall:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

When trap attack Dreary Cell triggers:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
passives.short_desc: Dreary Cell & Starfall BRV Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Dreary Cell & Starfall
